name: Furious Rider - The Line Maker
description:
Furious Rider - The Line Maker is a game.
Line Rider
How To Play -
You Have To Reach The End Flag With Bike 
By Drawing Various Kind Of Lines (Line Maker) Such As 
1.Normal Line(Furious Rider Bike Work with simple physics and gravity)
2.Boost Line (For Boosting The Furious Rider Bike)
3.Jumping Line (For Jumping The Furious Rider Bike)
4.Pass Through Line (These is a Virtual Line)

Then You Have To Ride On Line(Line Rider)
You Are A Furious Rider



Features:
- Funny Bike Physics
- Many Difficulties
- Many Ways to Complete A Level
- Character customization
- Two Chapters and Many Levels
- Path Editor
- Ability to draw Custom Path in a Level
- Great color Correction

New Free Mode Is Added ( On Developing )

Free Mode Features
- Amazing Vehicles With Realistic Physics
- Hill And Desert Tracks
- Amazing Boosters And Ramps
- New Car


A network connection is not required.

These(Furious Rider - The Line Maker) Game Is Available In Google Play Store For Free

Thanks for playing Furious Rider - The Line Maker ! Don't forget to rate the app and give us your feedback. We are constantly trying to improve the game and we love hearing your thoughts !
